root.name: Ben 10 Alien Force: The Game
root.description: OverviewBen 10 Alien Force: The Game is a action game based on the television series Alien Force airing on Cartoon Network, the game offers numerous playable alien forms, and an unlimited combo system with puzzles and challenges. It’s been five years since Ben put away the Omnitrix, but now Grandpa Max has gone missing and the planet Earth is in danger. You must lead eight different playable characters—including Cousin Gwen, enemy-turned-ally Kevin and five of Ben’s brand new alien forms - to utilize their all-new super powers and save the universe.FeaturesBen 10Authentic representation of the Alien Force world; explore places from show episodes and never before seen locations.Control Ben and five of his new alien forms.You can also play as Gwen and KevinPlay two-player co-op on the PS2 and WiiCreate unlimited attacks with a streamlined combo system
